scripts.build:android:dev: cross-env-shell ANDROID_DEPENDENCY=$npm_package_config_android_dev "npm run bundle:android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDevelopmentRelease"
scripts.build:android:stg: cross-env-shell ANDROID_DEPENDENCY=$npm_package_config_android_stg "npm run bundle:android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleStagingRelease"
scripts.build:android:prd: cross-env-shell ANDROID_DEPENDENCY=$npm_package_config_android_prd "npm run bundle:android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleProductionRelease"
scripts.ios:dev: export IOS_DEPENDENCY=$npm_package_config_ios_dev && npm run clean:ios && npm run ios:run:dev
scripts.ios:stg: export IOS_DEPENDENCY=$npm_package_config_ios_stg && npm run clean:ios && npm run ios:run:stg
scripts.ios:prd: export IOS_DEPENDENCY=$npm_package_config_ios_prd && npm run clean:ios && npm run ios:run:prd
scripts.build:ios:dev: export IOS_DEPENDENCY=$npm_package_config_ios_dev && npm run clean:ios && npm run bundle:ios && cd ios && xcodebuild archive -workspace example.xcworkspace -scheme Development -configuration DevelopmentRelease 'COMPILER_INDEX_STORE_ENABLE=NO' -archivePath example.xcarchive && xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath example.xcarchive -exportPath ./ -exportOptionsPlist ../export_options.plist
scripts.build:ios:stg: export IOS_DEPENDENCY=$npm_package_config_ios_stg && npm run clean:ios && npm run bundle:ios && cd ios && xcodebuild archive -workspace example.xcworkspace -scheme Staging -configuration StagingRelease 'COMPILER_INDEX_STORE_ENABLE=NO' -archivePath example.xcarchive && xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath example.xcarchive -exportPath ./ -exportOptionsPlist ../export_options.plist
scripts.build:ios:prd: export IOS_DEPENDENCY=$npm_package_config_ios_prd && npm run clean:ios && npm run bundle:ios && cd ios && xcodebuild archive -workspace example.xcworkspace -scheme Production -configuration ProductionRelease 'COMPILER_INDEX_STORE_ENABLE=NO' -archivePath example.xcarchive && xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath example.xcarchive -exportPath ./ -exportOptionsPlist ../export_options.plist
scripts.clean:ios: rm -rf ios/Pods ios/Podfile.lock; cd ios && pod install && cd ..
scripts.bundle:ios: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
